title: && has precedence over ||, this means that parentheses are placed to evaluate what would be evaluated together.

inline_content.Text: && has precedence over ||, this means that parentheses are placed to evaluate what would be evaluated together.

title: c++ uses short-circuit evaluation in && and || to not do unnecessary executions.

inline_content.Text: c++ uses short-circuit evaluation in && and || to not do unnecessary executions.

title: If the left hand side of || returns true the right hand side does not need to be evaluated anymore.

inline_content.Text: If the left hand side of || returns true the right hand side does not need to be evaluated anymore.
